titles.title: Student Loan Options Act
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to increase student options for the consolidation of their student loan obligations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 9/23/1997--Introduced. Student Loan Options Act - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 (HEA) to allow two-way consolidation of all of a student's Federal student assistance loans under either the Federal Family Education Loan Program (also known as Federal Stafford or guaranteed loans) or the Federal Direct Loan program. Reduces the amount of certain funds available for administrative expenses under the HEA student assistance program.
